attrib:
MANA LOSS: 8 / 16 / 24 / 32
DAMAGE: 20 / 35 / 50 / 65
RADIUS: 350 / 350 / 350 / 350
DURATION: 6
cmb:
MANA COST: 75/95/115/135
COOLDOWN: 20/16/12/8
desc: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.
lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
name: silencer_curse_of_the_silent

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Pure
cmb: MANA COST: 15/15/15/15
desc:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.
Glaives of Wisdom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes: Silencer will permanently steal 2 Intelligence from any enemy hero that dies within 900 range.
lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
name: silencer_glaives_of_wisdom

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
SILENCE/DISARM DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
DEBUFF DURATION: 5
DAMAGE: 150 / 200 / 250 / 300
cmb:
MANA COST: 115
COOLDOWN: 30/24/18/12
desc: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.
lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
name: silencer_last_word

cmb:
MANA COST: 250/375/500
COOLDOWN: 130
desc:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: This skill works on invisible and magic immune units, but gaining magic immunity will remove its effect.
lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
name: silencer_global_silence
